abstract: Eva-Maria Brem wins World Cup giant slalom race in St Moritz, Switzerland.

headline.main: Eva-Maria Brem Takes Giant Slalom Title

snippet: Eva-Maria Brem of Austria clinched the women’s giant slalom title by a mere 2 points on the last day of the World Cup finals in St. Moritz, Switzerland, for her first-ever crystal globe.
lead_paragraph: Eva-Maria Brem of Austria clinched the women’s giant slalom title by a mere 2 points on the last day of the World Cup finals in St. Moritz, Switzerland, for her first-ever crystal globe.
